remarks: The predicate "is a lattice plane" in terms of atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2012.)
statement:
islpln5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islpln5.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islpln5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islpln5.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islpln5.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
islpln2 $p |- ( K e. HL -> ( X e. P <-> ( X e. B /\ E. p e. A E. q e. A E. r e. A ( p =/= q /\ -. r .<_ ( p .\/ q ) /\ X = ( ( p .\/ q ) .\/ r ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p q r $.
$d .\/ p q r $.
$d A p q r $.
$d B p q r $.
$d K p q r $.
$d X p q r $.
